channel.title: My server questions. Help please :p
channel.description:
Hi guys, well I have a few questions. Please do your best to help me in the noobiest way possible, as I am a rather large noob :)
[b]I am using the base - Devo 2.7[/b]
1. How do I make it so if I click an object (bank booth, ((the one without the silver / grayish square on it )) open my bank?
2. How do I make it so if I click an NPC, he talks back. Eg. Click - "Hello sir how are you?" Click here to continue - "I'm good thanks, yourself?"
3. Similar to above, how do I make an npc talk to me, and ask if I want to go somewhere, and if yes, how do I make him tele me there?
4. How do I make strength, attack, and defence potions work, and how do I make prayer pots restore more?
5. Is there anyone / anywhere that I can find a tutorial for skills to work in [b]Devo 2.7[/b],
6. Can someone tell me the REAL RuneScape starter kit after you finish Tutorial island, along with their ID's please!
7. How do I make real NPCs sell real stuff? Ie. General store, how do I code it so if you trade that npc id, it opens the general store shop.
8. How do I make the charge spell on modern book, so if you click it, it does the anim and graphics, (I'm not too worried about the actual spell at the minute just want gfx and emote)
9. How do I make NPC's not walk through walls? It's like they have noclip!
I have all the gfx and emotes etc just need help with getting them to activate on charge spell hehe.
That's all for now, but chances are I will update with more when I need them
Thanks guys!

item.title: My server questions. Help please :p
item.dc:creator: @0mg_Noob 0mg Noob
item.description:
@0mg_Noob wrote:

[quote=“jman7, post:9, topic:301189”]personally go 0mg noob, but final devo isnt a skill server, dont use the leeched skills from his server because they might not work.
and dont listen to patsquare add your skills in a event manager esspecialy skills that deal with timings. add your magic in timings and etc. itll run the same and heres the tutorial link for this http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,321015.0.html[/quote]

Thanks man, and untill i work out how to make skills or add good versions of the skills in, i’ll have to use default

But thanks!
P.S - me and ancient are looking for two more coders that know how to code devo 2.7, for a development team,.

I am currently adding every single rs shop, with exactly the same items!

Still need questions answering!

Read full topic

and dont listen to patsquare add your skills in a event manager esspecialy skills that deal with timings. add your magic in timings and etc. itll run the same and heres the tutorial link for this http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,321015.0.html[/quote]

You know anything about Devo coding? Like, basically enough to help us make this server? ^^"
And we erased tons of shit and remade a lot of it.

item.title: My server questions. Help please :p
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

personally go 0mg noob, but final devo isnt a skill server, dont use the leeched skills from his server because they might not work.
and dont listen to patsquare add your skills in a event manager esspecialy skills that deal with timings. add your magic in timings and etc. itll run the same and heres the tutorial link for this http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,321015.0.html

item.title: My server questions. Help please :p

item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

trytohaxme:

Basically you just want someone to do it for you?

Basically he wants help. I’m helping him, but I’m not the best at devo coding, so…
IN GENERAL: If WE have a problem, WE can’t fix it, WE ask for help. Common Sense…

–Bump.

item.title: My server questions. Help please :p
item.dc:creator: @patsquare patsquare
item.description:
@patsquare wrote:

this is to get some skills to work crafting(taylor)and magic:
add this in client.java tayloring:

[code] else if(itemUsed == 1733 && useWith == 1741) {
if(playerLevel[24] >= 0) {
showInterface(2311);
}

case 33205:
if(playerHasItemAmount(1734, 2) && playerLevel[24] >= 9) {
RemoveAllWindows();
addItem(1167, 1);
deleteItem(1734, getItemSlot(1734), 2);
deleteItem(1741, getItemSlot(1741), 1);
addTaylXP(32);
sendMessage(“You make a leather cowl!!”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You havnt got any thread!”);
}
break;

	else if(itemUsed == 1733 && useWith == 1745) {

if(playerHasItemAmount(1745, 10) && playerLevel[24] >= 0) {
if(playerHasItemAmount(1734, 30) && playerLevel[24] >= 0) {
RemoveAllWindows();
addItem(1065, 1);
addItem(1099, 1);
addItem(1135, 1);
deleteItem(1745, getItemSlot(1734), 10);
deleteItem(1734, getItemSlot(1741), 40);
addTaylXP(1000);
sendMessage(“You make a green dragonhide sett!!”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You havnt got any thread or green dragon leather!”);
}

[/code]
add this too in client .java magic:

[code]if(magicID == 12975) // smoke barrage (lvl 86 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 86 && (actionTimer == 0))
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 50)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 25)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 75)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 75)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 50)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 25)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 75)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 75)==true))
{
startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(22);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();
inCombat();
stillgfx(391, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
actionTimer = 15;
sendMessage(“You poison the enemy.”);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 10);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 5);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 15);
deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 15);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 85)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 86 to cast this spell.”);
}
else if(actionTimer <= 14)
{
sendMessage(“DUDE… slow down wait a second to cast again! -.-”);
}
}

if(magicID == 12951) // smoke blitz (lvl 74 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 74 && (actionTimer == 0))
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 2)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 2)==true))
{
startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(18);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();
inCombat();
stillgfx(389, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
actionTimer = 15;
sendMessage(“You poison the enemy.”);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 2);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 2);
deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 73)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 74 to cast this spell.”);
}
else if(actionTimer <= 14)
{
sendMessage(“DUDE… slow down wait a second to cast again! -.-”);
}
}

if(magicID == 12963) // smoke burst (lvl 62 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 62 && (actionTimer == 0))
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(562, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 2)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(562, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 2)==true))
{
startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(18);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();
inCombat();
stillgfx(389, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
actionTimer = 15;
sendMessage(“You poison the enemy.”);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(562, getItemSlot(562), 4);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 2);
deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 61)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 62 to cast this spell.”);
}
else if(actionTimer <= 14)
{
sendMessage(“DUDE… slow down wait a second to cast again! -.-”);
}
}

if(magicID == 12939) // smoke RUSH (lvl 50 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 50 && (actionTimer == 0))
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(562, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(562, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==true))
{
startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(10);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();
inCombat();
stillgfx(385, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
actionTimer = 15;
sendMessage(“You poison the enemy.”);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(562, getItemSlot(562), 2);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 1);
deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 1);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 49)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 50 to cast this spell.”);
}
else if(actionTimer <= 14)
{
sendMessage(“DUDE… slow down wait a second to cast again! -.-”);
}
}

if(magicID == 12881) // ice burst (lvl 70 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 70 && (actionTimer == 0))
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(562, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
sendMessage("You need 2 “+getItemName(560)+”, 4 “+getItemName(562)+” and 6 "+getItemName(555));
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(562, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true))
{
startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(12);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].uberentangle();
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();
inCombat();
actionTimer = 15;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage(“You have been frozen!”);
sendMessage(“You poison and freeze the enemy!”);
stillgfx(363, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 2);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(562), 4);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 6);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 69)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 70 to cast this spell.”);
}
else if(actionTimer <= 14)
{
sendMessage(“DUDE… slow down wait a couple seconds to cast again! -.-”);
}
}

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 94 && (actionTimer == 0))
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true))
{
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 2);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6);
startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
inCombat();
actionTimer = 15;
sendMessage(“You poison and freeze the enemy!”);
stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.”);
}
else if(actionTimer <= 14)
{
sendMessage(“DUDE… slow down wait a second to cast again! -.-”);
}
}[/code]
addthis in client.java too mining:

[code]//mining!!!
//Mine copper
if ((objectID == 2090) || (objectID == 2091))
{
//actionAmount++;
if (actionTimer == 0)
{
actionName = “minecopper”;
actionTimer = 15;
pEmote = 0x271;
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

			}
			//Mine Tin
			if ((objectID == 2094) || (objectID == 2095))

			if ((objectID == 2098) || (objectID == 2099))

btw for mining for wen u mine for rocks to give you ore u need to add something like this in item2.java:

[code]public class Item2 {
public static int runerock[] = {
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451,
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451,
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451,
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451,
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451,
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 1481, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451,
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451,
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451,
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451,
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451,
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451,
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451,
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451,
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451,
451, 451, 451, 451, 451, 451};

public static int randomRuneRock() {
    return runerock[(int) (Math.random() * runerock.length)];
}

[/code]that makes the rune rock give you rune ore

item.title: My server questions. Help please :p
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

please go to “tutorial” section. There you should find your needs.

Read full topic

item.title: My server questions. Help please :p
item.dc:creator: @patsquare patsquare
item.description:
@patsquare wrote:

i dint understand the first question
for the starter pak of real runscape it is just 10 air runes and 10 mind runes and a wooden shield a couple of arrows and a bow
airrunes>556,mindrunes>558,woodenshield 1171,bronze arrow>882,bow 50
tut on npc to talk i dint make this tut so thank whowver made it)
Step 1

ok first of all you need to do is edit your client.java so you wont need any other files open.

First of you get the id of the npc you want to be made to talk, so I will use 1002 as an example (please not I don’t know which npc 1002 is, this is only an example) ok now look for
Code:

case 155: //first Click npc

now scroll down till you see something like :

Code:

} else if (NPCID == 494 || NPCID == 495) { /Banking/
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 1;
}

step 2

Under that add your npc so , like this :
Code:

else if (NPCID == 1002) {//the npc 1002
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 1339;
}

step 3

The two parts in bold are very important, the first one – 1002 has to be your npc id , so whatever the npc id is it has to go in here and the second bold 1339 is a case…. Now you need to make cases for the chat and cases for the accepting or declining.

Ok now for the cases look for
Code:

public void UpdateNPCChat() {

now under that you will see case1 , case 2, and so on…. Now add in your case so do this….

Code:

case 1339:
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902);
sendFrame126("", 4903);
sendFrame126(“HEY WHATS UP ADD YOUR TEXT HERE”, 4904);
sendFrame126(“MORE TEXT HERE”, 4905);
sendFrame126("", 4906);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
sendFrame164(4900);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;

now if you want there to be a choice dialogue then you need to add another case like so :
Code:

case 1340:
sendFrame171(1, 2465);
sendFrame171(0, 2468);
sendFrame126(“Select an Option”, 2460);
sendFrame126(“Yes, please”, 2461);
sendFrame126(“No, Thank you.”, 2462);
sendFrame164(2459);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;

now notice how that case is
Code:

case 1340:

and the one before was
Code:

case 1339:

that’s because you need them to come one after the other so if I chose … 10 i would need cases 10 and 11……

step 4
right now search for: case 40: and it should look something like this……
Code:

case 40:
if (NpcDialogue == 1 || NpcDialogue == 3 || NpcDialogue == 5 || NpcDialogue == 40 || NpcDialogue == 42

now on this bit :
Code:

if (NpcDialogue == 1 || NpcDialogue == 3 || NpcDialogue == 5 || NpcDialogue == 40 || NpcDialogue == 42 || NpcDialogue == 1001 || NpcDialogue == 1002 || NpcDialogue == 2259 || NpcDialogue == 2260 || NpcDialogue == 301 || NpcDialogue == 305 || NpcDialogue == 308 || NpcDialogue == 309 || NpcDialogue == 313 || NpcDialogue == 314 || NpcDialogue == 317 || NpcDialogue == 318 || NpcDialogue == 319 || NpcDialogue == 322 || NpcDialogue == 323 || NpcDialogue == 14600 || NpcDialogue == 14602) {

Add the
Code:

NpcDialogue == 1339

onto the end so make the above stuff look like this….(the bit in bold is what we just added)

Code:

if (NpcDialogue == 1 || NpcDialogue == 3 || NpcDialogue == 5 || NpcDialogue == 40 || NpcDialogue == 42 || NpcDialogue == 1001 || NpcDialogue == 1002 || NpcDialogue == 2259 || NpcDialogue == 2260 || NpcDialogue == 301 || NpcDialogue == 305 || NpcDialogue == 308 || NpcDialogue == 309 || NpcDialogue == 313 || NpcDialogue == 314 || NpcDialogue == 317 || NpcDialogue == 318 || NpcDialogue == 319 || NpcDialogue == 322 || NpcDialogue == 323 || NpcDialogue == 14600 || NpcDialogue == 14602 || NpcDialogue == 1339) {

case 40 makes anything number in the above code (which are cases in ure source) be +1 so it makes case 1339 move onto case 1340 once you click continue

ok now onto the part where if you chose “Yes, please “ or “no thank you”

step 5
ok now first is the “yes, please” ok clicking this option (which is also the first option in the dialogue) will require some coding in case 9157:
so look for case 9157: and you should see something like this :

Code:

case 9157:
if (NpcDialogue == 2) {
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
openUpBank();
} else if (NpcDialogue == 4) { //Aubury
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
openUpShop(2);
}

So the
Code:

if (NpcDialogue == 2) {

refers to the cases we were discussing earlier, and the
Code:

NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
openUpBank();

Is what it does once you have clicked on the “yes, please” , so using our example we will add our code (we will pretend it was to get teleported somewhere)

Add this near the others
Code:

else if (NpcDialogue == 1340) { //npc 1002
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
teleportToX = 1234;
teleportToY = 1234;
}

The
Code:

else if (NpcDialogue == 1340)

has to be the case the “yes, please” and “no, thank you” are on… so if I made the “1340” into “1341” it wouldn’t work or even “1339” wouldn’t work ok? Got it ? good

step 6
Ok now for the “no, thank you” ok clicking this option (which is the second option in the dialogue) which will require some coding in case 9158:
So look for case 9158: (under case 9157: ) and you will see something like this :
Code:

case 9158:
if (NpcDialogue == 2) {
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
openUpPinSettings();
} else if (NpcDialogue == 4) {
NpcDialogue = 5;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
}else if (NpcDialogue == 41){
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
RemoveAllWindows();
}

So this has the same concept as the case 9157, meaning that the
Code:

else if (NpcDialogue == 1340)

has to be 1340 (remember this is just an example number),
Code:

                 NpcDialogue = 0;
                 NpcDialogueSend = false;
                 RemoveAllWindows();

This code above is very important…… the
Code:

NpcDialogue = 0;

tells the server that the next dialogue to appear is 0, which means no more dialogues will appear, but you could have it as
Code:

NpcDialogue = 6678;

or something like that and it would load whatever is in case 6678:, the code below is also important
Code:

NpcDialogueSend = false;
RemoveAllWindows();

as it stop the server from sending the dialogue and then it closes the dialogue screen.

And that’s it, hope you enjoyed the tut and now understand how to add dialogues

Read full topic

item.title: My server questions. Help please :p
item.dc:creator: @0mg_Noob 0mg Noob
item.description:
@0mg_Noob wrote:

Hi guys, well I have a few questions. Please do your best to help me in the noobiest way possible, as I am a rather large noob

I am using the base - Devo 2.7

How do I make it so if I click an object (bank booth, ((the one without the silver / grayish square on it )) open my bank?

How do I make it so if I click an NPC, he talks back. Eg. Click - “Hello sir how are you?” Click here to continue - “I’m good thanks, yourself?”

Similar to above, how do I make an npc talk to me, and ask if I want to go somewhere, and if yes, how do I make him tele me there?

How do I make strength, attack, and defence potions work, and how do I make prayer pots restore more?

Is there anyone / anywhere that I can find a tutorial for skills to work in Devo 2.7,

Can someone tell me the REAL RuneScape starter kit after you finish Tutorial island, along with their ID’s please!

How do I make real NPCs sell real stuff? Ie. General store, how do I code it so if you trade that npc id, it opens the general store shop.

How do I make the charge spell on modern book, so if you click it, it does the anim and graphics, (I’m not too worried about the actual spell at the minute just want gfx and emote)

How do I make NPC’s not walk through walls? It’s like they have noclip!

I have all the gfx and emotes etc just need help with getting them to activate on charge spell hehe.

That’s all for now, but chances are I will update with more when I need them

Thanks guys!
